definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

sentences.english: This gave the Chinese people a better sense of balance in regard to this-worldlincss and other- worldliness .
sentences.chinese: 這使得中國人對於入世和出世具有良好的平衡感。

sentences.english: On the palate it is harmonious with a delicious sweetness and well balance acidity.
sentences.chinese: 酒體平衡，美味的甜度和酸度的和諧而統一。

sentences.english: The frequency equilibrium is a particular case of the stable equilibrium.
sentences.chinese: 頻率平衡是穩定平衡的特例。

sentences.english: The frequency equilibrium is a particular case of the stable equilibrium.
sentences.chinese: 頻率平衡是穩定平衡的特例。

sentences.english: We need emotions to make decisions - as in all things, balance is the key.
sentences.chinese: 我們需要情感來做決定，綜合來說，平衡是關鍵。

sentences.english: Analysis of harmonic response of unconstrained damped plate based on randomness of viscoelastic damping layer;
sentences.chinese: 本文用諧波增量平衡法分析縱橫向耦合梁的諧波響應。

sentences.english: They knock each other off balance just a little bit.
sentences.chinese: 她說，“他們只是一點點敲擊彼此的不平衡之處。”

sentences.english: If you have two or three parts in your sermon, they should be generally balanced in length.
sentences.chinese: 如果你的講章有兩到三個段落，段落長度一般要平衡。

sentences.english: Yet regulating haemostasis is a complex balancing act.
sentences.chinese: 然而控制止血法這一平衡過程相當複雜。

sentences.english: Ttip the punctuated equilibrium of market economics in their favor.
sentences.chinese: 以自己的方式確定市場經濟的準確平衡。

sentences.english: A dog with the correct proportions and angulation can thereby achieve static balance.
sentences.chinese: 擁有的正確比例和角度，從而達到犬隻的靜態平衡。

sentences.english: The ill-balanced payment system may have a lot of side effect.
sentences.chinese: 這個不平衡的工資系統將產生許多副作用。

sentences.english: But you should not have a huge imbalance between exposition and application.
sentences.chinese: 但你不能在解經和應用上出現較大的不平衡。

sentences.english: Without them I would not have led a healthy, balanced life.
sentences.chinese: 沒有他們，我不可能過着健康的心態平衡的生活。

sentences.english: Reevaluate the operation task of the operators and do not cause changes to the process flow.
sentences.chinese: 重新平衡操作工的作業含量，對過程流程不引起更改。

sentences.english: How do you switch off work when you're away from the office?
sentences.chinese: 超負荷工作時你要如何平衡你的生活？

definition: to adjust/to regulate/to harmonize/to reconcile (accountancy etc)
harmonious/to mediate/to reconcile/to compromise/mediation/to mix/to blend/blended/to season/seasoning/to placate
to attend simultaneously to two or more things/to balance (career and family, family and education etc)
to maintain/to keep up/to hold together
to coordinate/to harmonize/to fit together/to match (colors etc)/harmonious/concerted
whole entity/entire body/synthesis/as a whole (situation, construction, team etc)/global/macrocosm/integral/holistic/whole
